subject: Can't find must-have meds at your local drug store?
body:
Do you want to save your money and get high-quality pills?
Our shop
Make your life better. Even your sexual partner won't know you are using Viagra if you buy it here.
All this you can find here
Secure, confidential purchase!
With best regards,
George Schwartz
 
 
Altares, govorish, sgorel ot sobstvennogo zaklinaniia? utochnil ia. Posle Chudovishchnogo strazha eto novoe porozhdenie Giblyh Zemel, ili, kak ia ego Okrestil ne mudrstvuia lukavo, tumannik, ne vyzyvalo osobogo udivleniia, Zdes samoe mesto dlia podobnoj nezhiti, no vnimanie ia reshil udvoit. Nas ostanovil golos. Stop! oborval chuzhoj. 
Pravo, eto silno nervirovalo. Drugoj na tvoem meste mog by reshit, chto on tak neotrazim, Chto ia prosto reshila ego soblaznit. Posle togo kak ty poterial soznanie, dvoe profi otvolokli tebia v Rezidenciiu Dosa i ushli. Ia podumal, chto dolzhno projti nemalo vremeni, poka zhizn Doberetsia siuda i pustit pervye rostki. Ia ne stal toropitsia s voprosami. Pervaia lihoradochnaia mysl o tom, chto nado kuda-to bezhat, Kogo-to predupredit, sbezhala sama ranshe nego. Sobytiia ne zastavili sebia zhdat. Tak chto eti parni svoego dobilis. 
Barhatnyj, zhurchashchij smeh iz temnoty Sviazal golosovye sviazki. Na vsiu ostavshuiusia zhizn chernoe piatno Na chesti i sovesti, dazhe esli ob etom nikto i znat ne budet. Riadom so mnoj na svoej Lakomke skakala Taj, srazu za nami v pare dvigalis Onni s Kvinom, a arergard sostavila sviazka Gilsveri s Leksom. V takom sluchae ty samyj nastoiashchij Prokold, shefir, ia Usmehnulsia. ejisuminyon X1BcRlxCXUV0QllXUkAbREVSQFBDXlxbG1JT
